title: Essential Business Vocabulary
notes: Common business terms for professional conversations

vocabularyItems.meaning: A list of items to be discussed at a meeting
vocabularyItems.example: The meeting agenda was distributed a day in advance.

vocabularyItems.meaning: To work together with someone to produce something
vocabularyItems.example: Our teams collaborate on many projects.

vocabularyItems.meaning: A time or date by which something must be completed
vocabularyItems.example: We need to meet our deadline by the end of this week.

vocabularyItems.meaning: The basic physical and organizational structures needed for operation
vocabularyItems.example: The company is investing in its IT infrastructure.

vocabularyItems.meaning: To discuss and reach agreement through compromise
vocabularyItems.example: We need to negotiate the terms of the contract.
